actions.name: Regurgitation
actions.description:
Effect: The user makes a @Affliction[grapple] Maneuver against a creature at least one size smaller than the user, with +10 per CatMod difference. On success, the user Engulfs the target, equipping the creature as a [Stash] item.The user can only have one creature @Affliction[engulfed] at a time. An @Affliction[engulfed] creature cannot act or be affected by actions or effects in any way, except to free itself with a -20 @Affliction[grapple] check.

When the user hits a target with an attack while it has an @Affliction[engulfed] creature, it deals a Tick of HP damage to the target. This damage possesses the Type(s) of the @Affliction[engulfed] creature.

If the user gains @Affliction[fainted], the @Affliction[engulfed] creature may freely escape if it chooses, appearing in a space adjacent to the user.

actions.name: Gulp Missile (Engulfed)
actions.description:
Effect: The user launches their equipped @Affliction[engulfed] creature as part of this Attack, and may change the Type of this attack to a Type possessed by the launched creature. On hit, the target and the launched creature have a 20% chance to lose -1 DEF Stage for 5 Activations, a 20% chance to lose -1 SPDEF Stage for 5 Activations, and a 20% chance to gain @Affliction[paralysis] 5. The damage the launched creature takes from this attack is reduced by 2/3.

Requirement: The user has an @Affliction[engulfed] creature equipped as a [Stash] item.

system.description:

On success, the user Engulfs the target, equipping the creature as a [Stash] item.The user can only have one creature @Affliction[engulfed] at a time. An @Affliction[engulfed] creature cannot act or be affected by actions or effects in any way, except to free itself with a -20 @Affliction[grapple] check.

When the user hits a target with an attack while it has an @Affliction[engulfed] creature, it deals a Tick of HP damage to the target. This damage possesses the Type(s) of the @Affliction[engulfed] creature.

If the user gains @Affliction[fainted], the @Affliction[engulfed] creature may freely escape if it chooses, appearing in a space adjacent to the user.
